long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the spam posts from spam posters on one particular site (bbs.wforum.com). The site is a place where a group of people shares daily thoughts and, unfortunately, also a place spammers dumping random junk posts. This extension is called for dealing with such trouble, and through setting a block list, readers can choose to filter out unwanted posts to make the pages reader-friendly again.
